耕田.definition: to cultivate soil; to till fields

耕當問奴.definition: if it's plowing, ask the laborer (idiom); when managing a matter, consult the appropriate specialist

耕當問奴，織當訪婢.pinyin: geng1 dang1 wen4 nu2 , zhi1 dang1 fang3 bi4
耕當問奴，織當訪婢.definition: if it's plowing ask the laborer, if it's weaving ask the maid (idiom); when managing a matter, consult the appropriate specialist

耕者有其田.definition: "land to the tiller", post-Liberation land reform movement instigated by the CCP

耕耘.definition: plowing and weeding; farm work; fig. to work or study diligently

耕讀.definition: to be both a farmer and a scholar; to work the land and also undertake academic studies
